record.title: Modifiable risk factors of vaccine hesitancy: insights from a mixed methods multiple population study combining machine learning and thematic analysis during the COVID-19 pandemic.
record.subjects: United Kingdom ; Norway ; COVID-19 prevention & control ; COVID-19 psychology ; COVID-19 epidemiology ; Machine Learning ; Vaccination Hesitancy psychology ; COVID-19 Vaccines administration & dosage ; Humans ; Female ; Male ; Adult ; Risk Factors ; United Kingdom ; Middle Aged ; Norway ; SARS-CoV-2 ; Pandemics prevention & control ; Vaccination psychology ; Patient Acceptance of Health Care psychology
record.abstract: Declarations. Ethics approval and consent to participate: This study was ethically approved by The Norwegian Regional Committee for Medical and Health Research Ethics (REK; reference: 125510) and the Norwegian Centre for Research Data (NSD; reference: 802810). All participants provided their consent for their data to be used in this research. Consent for publication: Not applicable. Competing interests: The authors declare no competing interests.
